page.title: 08A Farmer's day
page.content: A dairy farmer gets up in the morning at 5.45am. He then milks all the cows, and by that time it would be 7.45am. Then at 8.00he has his breakfast which consists of cornflakes,toast with cheese and a cup of coffee. After breakfast he cleans the cow shed andfeeds the calves. At 12.30pm the employees and the farmer have there own lunch. All the employees bring their own lunch and the farmer has his with his wife. For the afternoon activities the farmer ploughs fields and tends to sheep. Then he carts dung and spreads it for fertilizer. After that he goes back to the farm to start to milk. He has a lady who comes to feed calves with milk. He feeds horses with bran and cows with cake. After supper he does paperwork and then relaxes before going to bed.
